open.subTitle: We believe in open source and transparency. We will support and drive open source technology forward. We also will be as transparent as possible regarding every aspect of our business.
open.title: Open Source

core.root: Fundamental values in which we stand upon

think.subTitle: We will strive to think as different as possible. We will not defer to the status quo, nor will we accept what is considered normal to be the norm. We value diversity & ingenuity more than anyone else.
think.title: Think Different

core.title: Core Values

work.subTitle: We will strive to do great work. We will not pursue work that we do not consider as being great. We do not lower our standards and continue to pursue towards being great in the moment.
work.title: Do Great Work

investor.back: We are backed by an incredible group of investors
investor.title: Our Investors

message.journey: for being part of us on the journey.

mission.mission: We help teams do great work
mission.special: Especially, those who strive to do great work
mission.target: We build products for all teams who work together online.
mission.title: Our Mission
